Room.Name: Platinum Eyes
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Platinum Eyes Shoppe which specializes in rare items.
Room.LongDescription: =============] This Shop is For Sale [=============== If you wish to purchase this shop, you must first get the Rules of Business from the Sleeping Deer Real Estate Office. After you have read the rules, contact one of the Dungeon Masters who will relieve you of your hard-earned gold, and give you a key to the place.
